preface.title: Prerequisites
preface.para: The following items have to be understood prior to reading this document:

listitem.para: Datatype mapping between MSSQL and Firebird. This is covered by the following document: ...to be added later...
Custom spx_... stored procedures are already loaded into Firebird.
Custom udf_... user defined functions such as udf_Varchar_To_GUID are already loaded into Firebird.
